Even though it seems to be easily removed by removing some page elements that include this pop-up and the overflow behind it an perhpas changing some properties of some elements. Unfortunately, I got distracted and now my limits are remporarily reinstated, so I can't provide the page code with this popup at this moment. Username: `@COOLak` ### Screenshots

호스트 OS에 금융 사이트 같은 사이트에서 한국 보안 프로그램을 설치하신 경우에 문제가 있을 수도 있습니다.
이 때, [구라제거기](https://teus.me/hoaxeliminator/HoaxEliminator7.25/)를 사용하셔서 모두 제거하신 후에 재부팅을 해보세요.
다음에는 VirtualBox, VMWare Workstation Player나 [식탁보 프로그램](https://yourtablecloth.app/)을 사용하시면 편리해집니다.

comment.body:
Videos playing on tvtoday.de fine every time I check, but it shows an ad video (first select an ad, then an ad if nothing is clicked).
With this rule the ad is not shown, but video is broken, tried different existing rules (
tvtoday.de#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-stack-trace', 'XMLHttpRequest', 'onreadystatechange')

With existing rule {window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send=new Proxy( it shows the selection, but the ad is just stuck at loading.

According to log it first loads global_config.json and then the real video and then the other VAST ads.
Real video domain:
`media.delight.video`

If I block all js and json files regarding damoh domain, it is taken a while until real video is loading.

```
s3.amazonaws.com/homad-global-configs.schneevonmorgen.com/global_config.json
hgc-cf-cache-1.svonm.com/www.tvtoday.de/config.json
hgc-cf-cache-1.svonm.com/hd-main.js
s3.amazonaws.com/homad-global-configs.schneevonmorgen.com/hd-main.js
```

Could you please check if we can speed it up a bit, thank you @AdamWr

comment.body:
I don't see ads, but sometimes there is a delay before video starts playing.
These rules:
```adblock
tvspielfilm.de#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'DL8_GLOBALS.enableAdSupport', 'false')
tvspielfilm.de#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'DL8_GLOBALS.useHomad', 'false')
tvspielfilm.de#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'DL8_GLOBALS.enableHomadDesktop', 'false')
```
seems to fix it (in the rules domain is `tvspielfilm.de`, because video player on `tvtoday.de` is from iframe `tvspielfilm.de`).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
To nie wygląda jak reklama, możliwe, że to jakiś błąd strony (to samo dzieje się z wyłączonym AdGuardem).
Po kliknięciu na odtwarzacz dodawany jest tag `style` (między innymi z `body {margin:0;padding:0;background-color:#000000;}`), który ustawia czarne tło.

Dodanie do reguł użytkownika tej reguły:
```adblock
gry-online.pl#$#body { background: #f4f4f4 !important; }
```
powinno sprawić, że tło się nie zmieni.

comment.body: 아마 다를 겁니다. 네이버 치지직 플레이어가 `veta.naver.com`으로 광고 요청을 하는데 이 요청이 차단되면 애드블록 오류를 띄웁니다. AdGuard DNS는 기본적으로 이 도메인을 차단하는데, AdGuard DNS 필터링 미사용 서버를 사용하시면 허용하기 때문에 결과가 다르게 표시될 것이라고 추측해봅니다.

comment.body:
Wygląda na to, że problem powoduje ta reguła:
```adblock
/^https:\/\/(www\.)?youtube(-nocookie)?\.com\/embed\/.*autoplay=1/$subdocument,redirect=click2load.html,domain=pl|~wykop.pl
```
z listy `Polish Annoyances Filters` i jest to związane z tym błędem - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/428
Jako tymczasowe rozwiązanie dodaj proszę do reguł użytkownika:
```adblock
/^https:\/\/(www\.)?youtube(-nocookie)?\.com\/embed\/.*autoplay=1/$subdocument,redirect=click2load.html,domain=pl|~wykop.pl,badfilter
```

<hr>

@krystian3w Mógłbyś proszę tymczasowo wykluczyć tę regułę:
```adblock
/^https:\/\/(www\.)?youtube(-nocookie)?\.com\/embed\/.*autoplay=1/$subdocument,redirect=click2load.html,domain=pl|~wykop.pl
```
z listy dla AdGuarda?

comment.body:
Now that I am a bit more experienced with coding, though only a tad (Very basic python knowledge), I might check out what is causing this.
Possibly there is checking for which domains are connecting?
![Screenshot 2024-05-16 8 27 21 AM](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/77800979/940fb7f3-a428-4b90-a313-3da6b3acd0a1)
e.g api.adinplay.com is blocked from connecting, so maybe that. Though I will need to figure out the exact cause before I open another issue over this if needed, e.g testing on Firefox browsers.

Когда Adguard включен, то на сайте https://diamant.ua/ru/catalog/ при использовании фильтров мы получаем страницу без результатов и только при повторной перезагрузке страницы результаты фильтрации видны и мы видим товары. Когда Adguard выключен, все работает исправно, то есть мы выбрали любые фильтра, применили их и видим товары результатов фильтрации. Такой проблемы ранее не было. Нужно решить ее. issue.title: Reconsider petametrics.com rules
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Blocking whole petametrics is problematic and causing lots of problems including https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/46126 and gigantic exception under https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161405. EasyPrivacy adjusted blocking as
```
||petametrics.com^$image,third-party
||query.petametrics.com^
||petametrics.com^$domain=meidastouch.com
```
by https://github.com/easylist/easylist/commit/418355816e4eed79acdef161d91f93e3e3c6f1fc I suggest the same, or at least exclude blanket blocking of the domain in DNS filter to fix `https://twitter.com/SeriousHoax/status/1791106709831959020`.

### Proposed solution

Adjust to granular blocking rules and remove some of excepion

### Additional information

cc: @SeriousHoax

pull_request.title: Attempted to improve close-out of Regex dots
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

None at the moment, as reports.adguard.com has no options for any scenarios like this.

### Enter the issue address

None at the moment, as reports.adguard.com has no options for any scenarios like this.

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

1. Your comment

I had noticed that some entries had unclosed .'s in RegEx entries, in particular in cases where one would normally expect them to be enclosed unless there's something I'm currently unaware of, such as domain names and when leading into file extensions. So I attempted to fix that in this PR.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/22780683/14c91290-daaf-457b-9ab1-6810e9af8e69)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.shopify.com/gdpr-cookie-consent](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.shopify.com%2Fgdpr-cookie-consent) ### Comment > I'm Alex from the Pandectes GDPR compliance app for Shopify. > We are currently the most popular app for Consent Management on the Shopify app store, and I am contacting you for an issue that our customers are facing on their stores. We have over 30.000 active stores and there is a large portion of store owners that use the "overlay" position for their cookie banner and are affected by this block. The overlay position by design hides the page content by adding an opaque div and blocking scrolling. When the banner div is removed by your app from the DOM, a user cannot interact with the store, and cannot scroll at all, providing a poor experience for our mutual customers. Username: `@ZagrebaAlex` ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://apps.shopify.com/gdpr-cookie-consent](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.shopify.com%2Fgdpr-cookie-consent) ### Comment > I'm Alex from the Pandectes GDPR compliance app for Shopify. > We are currently the most popular app for Consent Management on the Shopify app store, and I am contacting you for an issue that our customers are facing on their stores. We have over 30.000 active stores and there is a large portion of store owners that use the "overlay" position for their cookie banner and are affected by this block. The overlay position by design hides the page content by adding an opaque div and blocking scrolling. When the banner div is removed by your app from the DOM, a user cannot interact with the store, and cannot scroll at all, providing a poor experience for our mutual customers. Username: `@ZagrebaAlex` ### Screenshots

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
